name: Witchable
description:
You are an alchimist in your laboratory. Every day, you have 10 clients, hurry up to serve the potion they asked. You got multiple machines to transform your multiple ingredients.

For the moment 3 potions are available in the game. 

Good Luck

Gabriel De Castro

Clement Garcia

Julia Boffin

Manille Brun

Loona Pelacuer
